name: Hexball
summary:
Embrace the chaos. Rule the arena.

Hexball is a fast-paced, multiplayer VR sports game where up to 3 players face off in skill-based, over-the-top battles.

Jump into 1v1 duels or chaotic 3-player brawls. Easy to pick up, wild to master — every match explodes with clutch saves, ridiculous rebounds, and unpredictable power-ups.

Volley, block, dodge, and smash your way through neon-lit arenas in quickfire games that are just as fun to dominate as they are to mess around in.

Play. Flex. Win. Or just...
